title: ESEI and EEHI Science Coordination Seedcorn
abstractText: The overall aim of both the EEHI and ESEI programmes is the establishment of truly interdisciplinary teams of researchers, conducting high quality state-of-the-art innovative research, addressing national/international research priorities that will inform and impact on policy and practice. This grant will fund coordination, communication and KE across the ESEI and EEHI grants which address the aims of the ESEI and EEHI communications and KE plan.
